keyPolicies.policyDescription: Repeal the NHS Health and Social Care Act.
Make longer term tenancies the norm, stop rip off charges from landlords and get 200,000 homes built a year.
Create 1.5 million new green jobs by 2025, make five million homes energy-efficient within 10 years and make the UK's electricity supply carbon-free by 2030.
Tackle the cost-of-living crisis: cap energy bills, increase the minimum wage and back the Living Wage, guarantee working parents 25 hours free childcare for three and four year olds.
Fair but firm action on immigration: making it a criminal offence for companies to only advertise jobs abroad while ensuring Cambridge can attract top talent from abroad.

housing.content: Make longer term tenancies the norm, stop rip off charges from landlords and get 200,000 homes built a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: A progressive MP who will never prop up the Tories

endorsements.endorsement: is voting for Labour's Daniel Zeichner

images.caption: Professor Stephen Hawking with Daniel Zeichner
